mapper.insert: insert into club(club_name, club_image, club_content, club_loc, club_type, club_master) values(#{club_name}, #{club_image}, #{club_content}, #{club_loc}, #{club_type}, #{club_master})
mapper.update: update club set club_name=#{club_name}, club_image=#{club_image}, club_content=#{club_content}, club_loc=#{club_loc}, club_type=#{club_type}, club_master=#{club_master} where club_no=#{club_no}
mapper.select: select * from club order by club_no desc, club_regdate desc
